com.orm.androrm
Class Where

java.lang.Object
  com.orm.androrm.Where

public class Where
extends Object

Class representing the WHERE clause of the database.

NOTE THAT THIS CLASS WORKS ACCORDING TO THE RULES DEFINED BY THE query FUNCTION OF SQLiteDatabase.

Author:
Philipp Giese

Method Detail

setStatement

public void setStatement(Statement stmt)
Overwrite or set the current statement represented by this where clause. In order to create AND or OR statements rather use the respective functions.

Parameters:
stmt - Statement to apply.

and

public Where and(String key,
                 String value)
Adds an AND constraint.

Parameters:
key - Name of the table column.
value - Value of this column.
